ValidationRule.description: Cannot closed won an opportunity with a closed date in the past
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), /**Added as a part of SFDC-19036 : START**/ OR( ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISCHANGED( CloseDate ) ), /**Added as a part of SFDC-19036 : END**/ ISPICKVAL(Business_Group__c, 'MSP'), NOT($Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'De-book Re-book')), NOT($Permission.BYPASS_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY_FINANCE), NOT($Profile.Name = 'Apollo: Custom- Sales Operations'), NOT($Profile.Name = 'System Administrator'), CloseDate < TODAY() )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Unless you can warp time, please select a Close Date that is greater than (or equal to) today.
